m_szDocTitle: The Best of the Week - Collaborative ConsumptionCollaborative Consumption
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- The Best of the Week Every week we scour the internet to find the most interesting news on the collaborative consumption front. Here are our picks for the week: Times Are A-Changing Should business change to meet the regulations? Or, with the growth of sharing economy marketplaces, are we entering a phase where regulators will be the ones adapting ? A Rose By Any Other Name… Collaborative consumption, the sharing economy, peer-to-peer; call it what you will, it’s a hot topic around the world – but is it experiencing an identity crisis ?
